skill_constraints: Key person dependency on Senior Dev for CI/CD, Accessibility, and complex components.
resource_bottlenecks: Senior developer's time is the primary bottleneck, especially in Sprint 1.
mitigation_strategies: Prioritize knowledge transfer and paired programming on critical tasks.

skill_constraints: Increased mentoring overhead for Senior Dev, reducing their capacity for complex tasks.
mitigation_strategies: Assign only simple, well-defined atomic component tasks to the junior developer.
